content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for a fair price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Please make your first offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, the apartment is really beautiful and I am impressed by its location. However, I am a student and I have a budget. Therefore, I am willing to rent the apartment for 500 Euros per month. I hope we can find a solution that suits both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must say that 500 Euros per month is well below my expectations for such a prime apartment. My goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Therefore, I counteroffer with 650 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I understand your point of view and I respect your decision. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Therefore, I am willing to rent the apartment for 550 Euros per month. I hope we can find a solution that suits both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, 550 Euros per month is still too low for this apartment. I understand that you are a student with a limited budget, but I am a landlord who wants to get the highest price possible for my property. Therefore, I counteroffer with 625 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I understand your point of view and I respect your decision. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Therefore, I am willing to rent the apartment for 575 Euros per month. I hope we can find a solution that suits both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, 575 Euros per month is still too low for this apartment. I understand that you are a student with a limited budget, but I am a landlord who wants to get the highest price possible for my property. Therefore, I counteroffer with 600 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I understand your point of view and I respect your decision. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Therefore, I am willing to rent the apartment for 590 Euros per month. I hope we can find a solution that suits both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Your offer of 590 Euros per month is closer to my expectations, but it is still not enough for this apartment. I understand that you are a student with a limited budget, but I am a landlord who wants to get the highest price possible for my property. Therefore, I counteroffer with 605 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I understand your point of view and I respect your decision. Therefore, I agree to the price of 605 Euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [605] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi. I am glad we were able to reach an agreement. The apartment is unfurnished, so I suggest you start looking for furniture as soon as possible. The first month of rent and the security deposit will be due upon moving in. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for review. Please let me know if you have any questions.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
